org.apache.juneau.http.resource

Class FileResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.juneau.http.resource.BasicResource
      • org.apache.juneau.http.resource.FileResource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.http.HttpEntity, HttpResource

    public class FileResource
extends BasicResource
    A repeatable resource that obtains its content from a File.
    • Overview > juneau-rest-common
    • Source

      • setChunked

        public FileResource setChunked()
        Description copied from class: BasicResource
        Sets the 'chunked' flag value to true.
        • If the HttpEntity.getContentLength() method returns a negative value, the HttpClient code will always use chunked encoding.
        Overrides:
        setChunked in class BasicResource
        Returns:
        This object.
